Year: Includes data for the Indian-held part of Jammu and Kashmir, the final status of which has not yet been determined.
Data for urban agglomeration include New Delhi.

Data for urban agglomeration include Bally, Baranagar, Barrackpur, Bhatpara, Calcutta Municipal Corporation, Chandan Nagar, Garden Reach, Houghly-Chinsura, Howrah, Jadarpur, Kamarhati, Naihati, Panihati, Serampore, South Dum Dum, South Suburban, and Titagarh.
Included in urban agglomeration of Delhi.
Data refer to the New Delhi Municipal Council.
